snippet: Douglas A. Blackmon, a senior national correspondent who frequently covered politics at The Wall Street Journal, will be leaving to take an academic post at the University of Virginia and to cover politics for The Washington Post as a contributing...
abstract: Douglas A. Blackmon, a senior national correspondent who frequently covered politics at The Wall Street Journal, will be leaving to take an academic post at the University of Virginia and to cover politics for The Washington Post as a contributing editor.
lead_paragraph: 11:51 a.m. | Updated The Wall Street Journal is expected to announce on Monday that Douglas A. Blackmon, a senior national correspondent who frequently covers politics, will be leaving the newspaper to take an academic post at the University of Virginia and to cover politics for The Washington Post as a contributing editor.

headline.main: Blackmon and Stecklow Join the Exit of Veterans From The Journal
